20443000.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「リャナ荒涼地帯:
Sometimes near the crumbling lighthouse in the Lyana Desolate Area, there is a very sweet smelling flower called the Sweet Pea flower.
It smells sweeter than candy, and it makes me hungry just thinking about it! Sweet Pea flowers were planted in the lighthouse when it
was built, and they are still blooming today as a remnant of the original plantings. The area used to be crowded with people who came
to see Alltrades Abbey, but since the lighthouse collapsed, the area has completely deserted.

20443001.「いらっちゃいまて！\n あたち ゆうびんやしゃんゴッコ ちてるの！: I'm so frustrated! We're playing postman!

95910.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「このまえ 教会:
My church kids went outside to play with my task the other day, but they came right back. There must be some scary monster out there. Go
get 'em, you little bastards! I'll do whatever the kid says!

95911.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こんにちは 旅:

Church, you should go see her.

95913.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なあなあ <p:

95914.「ベリルのほら穴に 行きたいのか？\n そこの門から 町を出て\n 東へ進んでい:

by leaving town through the gate there and
heading east!

95915.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……ン。女王様:
I was introduced to a new companion, Selik, by the Queen. The Queen introduced me to a new companion named Selik, but at that time,

with the Queen.

95916.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「……ム。<pc:

95917.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「女王さまがつれ:
The Torban instrument that Ni-chan brought the Queen with her is so cool. I want to play it once. Hey, . Come get a call

95918.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「女王さまが 帰:
I was so surprised when I thought the Queen had come back with a strange little girl! I took her to High Church to introduce her to
everyone in town, so why don't you go see her?

95919.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あのね あのね:
Hey, hey, hey! The Queen brought a young man named Selik here! Unlike the other boys, he's kind to the girls, he's cool, he's mature, and
he's just wonderful!

95920.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「……ム。セリク:
Selik said he was going to practice Torban and walked towards the clinic. I didn't know our companion still existed in this world. I don't
know if I should be happy or not, but it's a little complicated.

95956.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……ン。いつも:
I can usually hear Selik's Torban tone on the wind. Normally I can hear Selik's Torban tone on the wind, but for some reason I can't hear

95957.「よう <pc>！\n 女王さまが また オマエに\n 頼みたいことが あるみた:

95959.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ボクたち セリ:

95962.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「……ン。そろそ:

95963.「……ム。<pc>か。\n さっき セリクから聞いたけど\n トゥーラの修理 手:

95968.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「……ム。<pc:

96005.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「……ン。なんだか:

85939.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「あっ <pc>:
